short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically open a specific URL at scheduled time in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension Automatically open a specific URL at a scheduled time in your browser.

You can set the scheduler by 
- Daily 
- Weekday
- Every xx minutes/hours/days
- One-time

You can set scheduler themes as you like.
